display_long_description:
Rhythm Rumble brings the thrill of boxing right into your living room with an immersive mixed reality experience in Quest 3, Quest 3S & Quest Pro. Transform your space into a virtual gym where you can train like a pro boxer while enjoying the convenience of home.

Punch your way through rhythmic workouts where every move is synced to pulsating beats, creating an intense and engaging training session. With lifelike graphics and realistic environments, you'll feel like you're in the ring, perfecting your skills without ever stepping foot outside.

Whether you're a beginner learning the basics or an experienced fighter looking to sharpen your technique, Rhythm Rumble offers a variety of training modes tailored to all skill levels. 

But the real excitement comes with Leaderboard mode, where you can go head-to-head with friends or other players. Test your skills in thrilling matches and climb the ranks to become the ultimate champion of Rhythm Rumble.

With intuitive controls and addictive gameplay, Rhythm Rumble delivers an unparalleled XR boxing experience that's both challenging and fun. Whether you're looking to get in shape, improve your technique, or simply enjoy a great workout, Rhythm Rumble has something for everyone. So put on your gloves, clear some space, and get ready to rumble in the comfort of your own home!
